main: ^Dinamulag Festival is celebrated during the month of March or April. It is also known as the Zambales Mango Festival and it is an annual festival held in the province of Zambales.

c-0: ^This will celebrate or encourage boundtiful harvest of the province's mangoes.
^The festival was first held in 1999, and mangoes are a primary crop of the province of Zambales.
^Carabao mangoes were cited as the world's sweetest mangoes by Guinness World Records in 1955.
